# DialogResource

**Extends:** [Resource](../Resource)

## Description

A dialog of characters speaking (or a monolog as well)

## Property Descriptions

### id

```gdscript
var id: String
```

The descriptive id of this dialog

### lines

```gdscript
var lines: Array
```

A list of dialog lines to speak
